name: Rock P̶a̶p̶e̶r̶ Scissors
description:
Play as a scissor which collects paper while avoiding dangerous rocks in a beautiful setting. A simple endless runner to relax to :) (PS- also my first game)

Up key for jump - PC

Tap for jump- Mobile platform
